title: Vocabulary Learning Design Based on Content Acquisition Podcasts (CAPs) for Students with High-Incidence Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic vocabulary comprehension and ability to utilize digital media
context.additional_context: Learners are university students with high-incidence disabilities (learning disabilities, ADHD, etc.) struggling to acquire core vocabulary for general curricula. The goal is to enhance vocabulary comprehension through podcast-based self-directed learning and teacher-student interaction

learning_goals: Learners can define and explain over 20 subject-related core vocabulary terms presented through podcasts with 80% accuracy
Learners can apply vocabulary usage examples emphasized in CAPs to actual sentence writing and oral expression
Learners can produce personalized vocabulary learning podcasts using digital tools (recording/editing software)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
